entries.title_d: The Rebels have launched an attack on the local TIE defense force. The TIE force has been badly hurt and are now regrouping for a final stand. Those fighters are vital to the operations in the Endor system and need to be protected. You must save the TIEs.
entries.title: Endor System: Battle the Rebel Forces
entries.split_quest_alert: An enemy scout vessel has been detected in the area. Disable that scout and recover the contents of its main frame.
entries.quest_location_d: The navigation waypoint to the TIEs rally point will be supplied to you.
entries.quest_helpallies_t: Help the TIEs Defeat the Rebel Forces
entries.quest_helpallies_d: You must destroy the Rebel attackers before they can eliminate the remaining TIE fighters.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: Travel to the navigaiton waypoint and join up with the TIE squadron.
entries.found_loc: We have the location of the besieged TIEs. Travel to the navigation waypoint immediately and protect those fighters.
entries.enemies_win: The wing has been destroyed. The Rebellion may have won this battle but they have not won the war. Return to your superior officer.
entries.battle_started: The enemy has engaged the TIE fighters.
entries.battle_abandoned: You have left the TIE defense force at the mercy of our enemies. The Empire does not tolerate cowards. Report back to your superior.
entries.allies_win: You have handed the Empire a glorious victory over the Rebellion.
entries.allies_arrived: Allied TIE fighters regrouping to try to fend off the Rebel assault.
